channel.title: HavokOnline full source [RELEASE]
channel.description:
Since its gotten out of hands, im releasing the full source to anyone who wanna use it. copy+paste to your own, or rename the source or do whatever you want. ----- (This is by no means something special, its just the HavokOnline source free for anyone to use) i coded this source for Chase (his idea), then other people got their hands on it. and well, theres an readme/setup tutorial for all you wanna-know-howto's, wuhu!
----- [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/152142230/Havokonline.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/152142230/Havokonline.rar.html[/url] <- click for download. -forum -empty db -server source -client source >all credits to reines for rscd base. and if your gonna use it, atleast give me some credits mafackas!
enjoy!

item.title: HavokOnline full source [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“lolwat22, post:42, topic:235688”][quote author=bonzakid link=topic=310820.msg2705353#msg2705353 date=1236945460]

No pictures/barlie any detail, You should fix it up more… and post some pictures, Mods go through this with him…

You should get out of this section.

indeed… I agree
[/quote]Agreed.

On-Topic: This source is really shitty, it’s riddled with bugs that rscd v25 didn’t have.[/quote]

so dont use it…

Berk:

Is this a points to xp from the forum type of source…?

no this is PK points, kill someone get a point trade points for stuff

this is also a ::setstats server, set your own stats whenever you want

Read full topic

item.title: HavokOnline full source [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“extacy, post:21, topic:235688”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=310820.msg2481117#msg2481117 date=1223541144]
Someone should make a client-side GUI for point options.
[/quote]

Elaborate on this[/quote]
Like a JFrame that pops up when you click a button somewhere on the client, has components to change your stats (like a control panel, but in the client) and sends data to the server, server checks and handles it from there.

Read full topic
